originalText.text: After going to a provider for many years and being treated like a number, I decided it was time for a change. After my friends recommendation, I made an appointment with Dr Silver. I could not be happier. He has so much knowledge and he takes the time to thoroughly explain all of my questions and concerns in layman's terms. I never feel rushed out without all my needs being addressed. And the cherry üçí on top is his fantastic office staff, they are always available to answer questions if I call the office with any type of question...

text.text: After going to a provider for many years and being treated like a number, I decided it was time for a change. After my friends recommendation, I made an appointment with Dr Silver. I could not be happier. He has so much knowledge and he takes the time to thoroughly explain all of my questions and concerns in layman's terms. I never feel rushed out without all my needs being addressed. And the cherry üçí on top is his fantastic office staff, they are always available to answer questions if I call the office with any type of question...

originalText.text:
I been coming to Dr. Silver for over three years now. I deal with severe chronic arthritis within my foot from a post Liz Franc Fracture. The foot healed dislocated which causes me a slight limp and deformed foot. I also deal with severe back and hip pain from this biomechanical injury.   Dr. Silver has helped me tremendously with dealing with this pain. I get different forms of physical therapy in office and remote, along with local injections and meds to help give me a normal life again. He always takes his time and talks with me on any improvements or set backs I had between visits.

I recommend him highly in his field of occupation.

originalText.text: Fantastic doctor. Truly cares about his patients and wants to make our lives better. Great listener. Excellent bedside manner and sense of humor. The people who work at the front desk are very understanding and helpful.

originalText.text: Dr. Silver is very knowledgeable.  He has many years experience and understands your needs.  He has very good bedside manner and  cares about his patients.

originalText.text:
Dr. Russel has been seeing me for the past five years. He has a beautiful bedside manner. He takes his time and really listens to all of your questions and needs. He has created an excellent plan to help with my pain. After I moved I still travel to see him because he is just worth it.

KK
